Introduction

Lee Seonghwa (이성화) is a South Korean singer and model. She was a member of the girl group Carcaro Girl. She has a younger sister, Lee Dayeon, who is also a racing car model. She’s currently under Secretion Music Korea. She’s also a DJ under the stage name Second Night.
